org.hibernate.search.backend

Class LuceneWork

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.backend.LuceneWork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddLuceneWork, DeleteByQueryLuceneWork, DeleteLuceneWork, FlushLuceneWork, OptimizeLuceneWork, PurgeAllLuceneWork, UpdateLuceneWork

    public abstract class LuceneWork
extends Object
    Represent a unit of work to be applied against the Lucene index.

    Note:
    Instances of this class are passed between Virtual Machines when a master/slave configuration of Search is used. It is the responsibility of the LuceneWorkSerializer respectively SerializationProvider to serialize and de-serialize LuceneWork instances.

    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard, Hardy Ferentschik, Sanne Grinovero

      • acceptIndexWorkVisitor

        public abstract <P,R> R acceptIndexWorkVisitor(IndexWorkVisitor<P,R> visitor,
                                               P p)
        Accepts the given visitor by dispatching the correct visit method for the specific LuceneWork sub-type.
        Type Parameters:
        P - Context parameter type expected by a specific visitor
        R - Return type provided by a specific visitor
        Parameters:
        visitor - the visitor to accept
        p - a visitor-specific context parameter
        Returns:
        a visitor-specific return value or null if this visitor doesn't return a result
